name: You Require Additional Rockets
description:
You Require Additional Rockets it's a solo project developed for the Quarantine Game Jam 2020 in the course of 3 days.

Thanks to the hosts for organizing the event and special thanks to waxwolf for the magnificent music.

How to play:

Mouse: Move rockets

Spacebar: Release rockets

Releasing rockets will cause them to spread in random directions!

Consume kills to buy more rockets!
